Introduction

Miaoyan Zhang

My name is Miaoyan Zhang, currently a Computer Science student at the University of Pennsylvania. I have one year of full-time Software Engineer work experience and I'm now looking for 2022 summer SDE internship.

About Me

Biography

I enjoy coding, creating beautiful websites makes me happy. I like playing soccer and I'm the captain of my undergraduate school's men's soccer team. I'm also an amateur photographer.

  • CityDNA
    ( Nov 2020 — Aug 2021 )

    Sofrware Engineer

    • Independently implemented EzScene - a space-time scenario simulation application framework and 2D/3D webGL system. • Implemented EzDataManagement - a data management platform for users to CRUD database online.

  • CityDNA
    ( Jun 2020 — Nov 2020 )

    Software Development and Data Analysis Intern

    • Crawled over 5 million sales and rent data. • Further developed ArcPy algorithms. • Developed machine learning models to predict land-use with satellite imagery.

  • World Resources Institute
    ( Feb 2019 – Jun 2019 )

    Analytics Intern

    • Collected data and adopted different machine learning models to predict global transportation emissions in 50 years.
